alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 15 at 5:03AM AKST until December 16 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 PM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Strong winds and blowing snow with low visibility expected. West winds gusting as high as 55 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 9 PM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could cause damage to buildings. Areas of blowing snow will cause reduces visibility with brief blizzard conditions possible. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...West winds will increase from this afternoon into tonight, with the strongest winds from late tonight through Friday afternoon. Winds are expected to decrease late Friday night.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas.
